channel.title: Psychic's mind link problem
channel.description: This has become a common strategy when playing as a Psychic. People usually wait a few seconds and then use their link ability to catch an unsuspecting Unseen or Cult member communicating with team members. The question is - should this be possible? What do you think about implementing a slight delay before the Psychic can actually see what you talk?
